sheetproject.spreadsheet

Class Cell

  • java.lang.Object
    • sheetproject.spreadsheet.Cell

  • public class Cell
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing a cell in a spreadsheet table
    Author:
    Robin Borst, Martijn Gribnau, Roy Klip, Mitchell Olsthoorn, Ike Rijsdijk, Alan van Rossum
